Articles.Content:
I thought the NASA pack was coming in .24 but game in as a patch. .23.5. But I am now unsure what content is coming for .24.

thanks.
Everything which is marked in blue: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features
Thanks for the response I don't know if that's all they'll add in .24. Anywho, mod can now lock this tread.
The actual planned features are just things they've confirmed to be adding at some point in the future. What's actually going to be in 0.24 hasn't really been announced yet.
